column1: However the learned  Magistrate in  the course of her order,  has also held

column2: that the evidence given  by the pillion  rider (Heripitiyalage Sachin
Chaturanga) cannot be  accepted  as a truthful testimony,
that the said  pillion  rider by giving false evidence  before Court,  had
deliberately attempted to show that this incident is a murder,
that this incident is  not a murder,
